developer.text: I didn’t touch that part of the code.
It’s not a bug, it’s a feature.
The build failed, but spiritually it succeeded.

manager.text: We’re aligning priorities with future outcomes.
Let’s park this for the next sprint.
We’ll circle back after the retro.

qa.text: It passed locally, so it must be an environment issue.
Repro steps? It’s random. Embrace chaos.

intern.text: I thought git push -f was faster.
I was just experimenting in production.

ai.text: My model wasn’t trained on that scenario.
